description.tooltip: Analyse de l'utilisation du cache de plans
description.label: Plans en cache

queries.query: SELECT 'total' as type, cp.cacheobjtype, cp.objtype, SUM(cp.size_in_bytes/1024.00) / 1024 AS [Plan Size in MB] FROM sys.dm_exec_cached_plans AS cp WITH (NOLOCK) CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(plan_handle) GROUP BY cp.cacheobjtype, cp.objtype UNION ALL SELECT 'usecounts_1' as type, cp.cacheobjtype, cp.objtype, SUM(cp.size_in_bytes/1024.00) / 1024 AS [Plan Size in MB] FROM sys.dm_exec_cached_plans AS cp WITH (NOLOCK) CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(plan_handle) WHERE cp.usecounts = 1 GROUP BY cp.cacheobjtype, cp.objtype OPTION (RECOMPILE);
